headline: Analysts Estimate Equifax (EFX) to Report a Decline in Earnings: What to Look Out for
summary: Equifax (EFX) doesn't possess the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely earnings beat in its upcoming report. Get prepared with the key expectations.

headline: Equifax Bets On New AI Fraud And Income Tools For Lenders
summary: Equifax (NYSE:EFX) has introduced Income Confirm, a tool that combines verified employment and income data with credit reports for credit card lending decisions. The company has also launched Synthetic Identity Risk, an AI driven product designed to help lenders identify and address synthetic identity fraud. Both products are aimed at giving lenders more detailed risk assessment, faster decisioning, and additional fraud controls. Equifax, trading at $208.03, is rolling out these new...
